question_sentence: Which platform didn’t experience a widespread outage Monday?
Tom Brady earned a win over his former Patriots teammates this week. What NFL record did he achieve during the game?
choices: Most passing yards in a single game

question_sentence: Which actor who starred in a space-related movie will take part in a Blue Origin flight?
Former president Donald Trump wasn't on the Forbes 400 list of richest Americans for the first time in 25 years. Forbes reported he was worth:
This week, social media star Bretman Rock made history as the first:
choices: Philippines-born person to surpass 10 million Instagram followers
Person to write and take photos for a “Rolling Stone” cover story
Gay male to be cast as a lead in a CBS show

question_sentence: Workers at which cereal company walked off the job Tuesday over benefits and layoffs?
Kids, who make up 22% of the U.S. population, account for what percentage of COVID-19 cases, per the American Academy of Pediatrics?
Facebook disagreed with a former manager's testimony to lawmakers that it has put “profits over people.” The company, however, conceded that:
choices: It’s responsible for the Jan. 6 Capitol riot.
New rules for social media are long overdue.

question_sentence: The Public Service Loan Forgiveness program, which the Education Department has vowed to overhaul, is intended to benefit:
Who was crowned champion in the Katmai National Park and Preserve’s 2021 Fat Bear Week competition?
Andrew Lloyd Webber has said he disliked the 2019 film adaptation of his musical Cats so much that he bought what animal for emotional support?
evidence: Lloyd Webber described the film as ‘off-the-scale all wrong’ and said it left him so ‘emotionally damaged’ he bought a dog in order to recover. ‘The one good thing to come out of it is my little Havanese puppy,’ he said.

question_sentence: The NHS is to embark on the largest programme of flu jabs in its history as government officials warn how many people could die from the virus this winter?
evidence: A record 35m people will be offered jabs as experts warn the coming season could be particularly deadly as the population has lost much of its immunity over the past 18 months.

question_sentence: What is the name of the itchy skin condition that can occur after being infected with Covid-19?
evidence: The condition usually affects the toes but can also be found on the fingers, causing chilblain-like inflammation and redness.

question_sentence: Which Hollywood star will be sent into space next week as part of a Blue Origin launch?
evidence: ‘Yes, it’s true. I’m going to be a rocket man... it’s never too late to experience a new thing,’ said the 90-year-old Star Trek star.

question_sentence: The World Health Organization has given the green light for the rollout of a vaccine that protects against which deadly tropical disease?
evidence: The vaccine prevented 39% of malaria cases and 29% of severe malaria cases children in Africa during four years of trials.

question_sentence: What is the name of the ‘hyper violent’ South Korean show on track to become Netflix’s biggest ever original series?
evidence: The dystopian thriller is centred around a brutal survival game where poor  South Koreans are forced to compete for a prize of 45.6bn won (£28m).

question_sentence: Nasa plans to crash a spacecraft into which asteroid system to test its ‘planetary defence’ techniques?
evidence: The mission, known as a Double Asteroid Redirection Test (DART), will assess if it is possible to divert an incoming celestial body that threatens earth.

question_sentence: Which farm animal is facing a mass cull after abattoir labour shortages led to livestock overcrowding?
evidence: In September, an estimated 85,000 additional pigs were being housed on UK farms, a figure increasing by approximately 15,000 per week due to labour shortages.

question_sentence: The US faced ‘a tsunami of lethal violence’ last year with the murder rate rising by how much, according to FBI data?
evidence: Some 5,000 more Americans were murdered last year than in 2019, bringing the total body count to 21,570.

question_sentence: Which Australian state is expected to be the first to allow its residents to travel abroad as part of a phased reopening of the country’s borders beginning next month?
evidence: Australians living in the state will be eligible to travel out of the country when its vaccination rate is forecast to reach 80%.
